tool_description: The Power of an Accurate API and XNPV Integration
name: XNPV (npv) calculation via API
title: XNPV (npv) calculation via API

api_list.name: XNPV Calculation
api_list.description:
Harnessing the Power of XNPV: Unlocking the Benefits of an Accurate NPV Calculation API.

The object must contain two keys:
1. datesAndAmounts
2. discount

datesAndAmounts is an array of arrays. Each array contains information about the cash flow amount and its date. Amounts can be numbers or text.

discount - the discount rate. If the user wants to transfer, for example, 7.7%, he must transfer 0.077.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xnpv-npv-calculation-via-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xnpv-npv-calculation-via-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xnpv-npv-calculation-via-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xnpv-npv-calculation-via-api.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
